name: Micro-Credential Attestation SD-JWT VC Type Metadata

display.name: Learning Credential
display.description: Learning Credential

display.label: JWT ID
display.description: A unique identifier for the token

display.label: Issued At
display.description: The time at which the JWT was issued

display.label: Expiration Time
display.description: The time on, or after which the JWT MUST NOT be accepted

display.label: Verifiable Credential Type
display.description: A URI identifying the credential type

display.label: Issuer
display.description: The Principal that issued the JWT

display.label: Confirmation
display.description: Key to be used by the Holder to verify Proof of Possession

display.label: Json Web Key
display.description: Json Web Key to be used by the Holder to verify Proof of Possession

display.label: Issuing Authority
display.description: Name of the administrative authority that issued the learning credential

display.label: Issuing Country
display.description: Alpha-2 country code, as specified in ISO 3166-1, of the country or territory of the issuer of the learning credential

display.label: Date of Issuance
display.description: The date the achievement was issued

display.label: Date of Expiry
display.description: The date which the achievement expires

display.label: Family Name(s)
display.description: The family name(s) of the credential holder

display.label: Given Name(s)
display.description: The given name(s) of the credential holder

display.label: Achievement Title
display.description: The official title of the micro-credential or course

display.label: Achievement Description
display.description: A brief description of the achievement

display.label: Learning Outcomes
display.description: A list of titles for the specific skills or competences gained

display.label: Learning Outcome
display.description: Title for the specific skill or competence gained

display.label: Assessment Grade
display.description: The grade awarded to the student (e.g., "Pass", "A+")

display.label: Language of classes
display.description: In what language was the class conducted (e.g., "en", "ja")

display.label: Learner identification
display.description: Learner identification number

display.label: Expected study time
display.description: Expected study time to attain learning outcomes

display.label: Level of learning experience
display.description: Indicates competences as defined by the EQF

display.label: Form of participation
display.description: Form of participation in learning activities, e.g., online or in-person

display.label: Types of quality assurance
display.description: The quality assurance type used by the Institution (e.g., "Internal Evaluation", "External Evaluation")

display.label: Prerequisites to enroll
display.description: Prerequisites needed to enroll in the learning activity (e.g., "Basic algebra")

display.label: Prerequisite to enroll
display.description: Prerequisite needed to enroll in the learning activity (e.g., "Basic algebra")

display.label: Evaluator verification
display.description: Evaluator: By name / Identity proofing: Method used at the time of issuing the credential
